__e: Yes, well, the cookies came from...
His cakes are not as good!
Mmm! These cookies are so good... And so easy to reach.
All we got is biscuits and tea left.
Not until you eat these and tell me what you think.
Now, why don't you forget those biscuits and get ready.
Look,I-I spent the whole night making you these cookies.
I don't suppose you're here to sell cookies?
Free to think, free to work, free to climb a mountain or lie in bed all day eating peppermint creams without any bugger telling me how.
She used to bake cookies when we'd come home from school. Play kickball with us in the backyard.
We never had any cookie jars in my home because my mother never baked us any cookies because she never felt we deserved any cookies.
I thought you might be hungry sitting out here all day so I baked you some cookies.
I have some cookies for you, too.
Next time, I'll bring some crackers for the boys, okay?
And I know the pain is still there, you cannot think straight... but you have to eat.
Margaret, you can come over and make those oatmeal cookies... for me anytime you want to.
How does someone as busy as you have time to bake cookies?
You say you want a strong woman to share this crazy life you've chosen... but when push comes to shove, you want me to stay home and bake cookies.
